channel.title: Pkp Farming Prevention & Starter tradeing
channel.description:
Hello people, im currently running hybrid pvp source. i had wanted some help on makeing it so you cant kill the same ip within 30 minutes - 1 hour. ex: 1st kill you receive 5 pkp. 2nd kill you receive nothing. i also wanted some help on so you can trade right away when you start eX: a 5 min timer before you can trade.
Thanks! -Nate.
p.s. if you need me to post any code just tell me to
